ygData.subject: Where o' where is Lesser Shielding spell???
ygData.msgSnippet: I am looking for the location at which Lesser Shielding can be purchased? Im a DE in Neriak, well now bound in the FP necro guild so not as many zones. I just
ygData.messageBody:
I am looking for the location at which Lesser Shielding can be purchased? Im
a DE in Neriak, well now bound in the FP necro guild so not as many zones. I
just reached level 8 and am not completely happy with my spell selection. I
am hoping my new pet can take a bit more damage since I got tired of taking
most of the beating up to this level. I use the /assist hotkey when I send a
pet into battle so I can easily swap back and forth from the mob to my pet
to see when I need to jump in.

I really really just need to know where/how I can get lesser shielding since
I was looking forward to it. One person said its in the necro guild, well I
looked, another said its in the wiz guild, I looked there, heck I looked in
every guild in Neriak and nothing. Another person told me I needed a Paladin
to get it for me, but if spells are lore items you cant trade them. Grr, I
am just hoping someone can/will tell me where to get this and end my misery!
:-)

Darzi - Dark Elf on Veeshan of the 8th circle.
